name: places/ChIJy7WAAKJZwokRNQSiXM6DbW8
formattedAddress: 40 Union Square E # 1, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 40 Union Square E # 1, New York, NY 10003-3210, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve been buying my glasses here for years. This is the only place I go for glasses. They have gorgeous creative designer frames for all face shapes and sizes!  The lenses are the highest quality. The difference between these lenses and others is enormous. It’s like you’re not even wearing glasses!
The staff will help you select the perfect frame and lenses. They are amazing; very knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful!

text.text:

The staff will help you select the perfect frame and lenses. They are amazing; very knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful!

originalText.text: I found Petite Optique when I needed to refresh my style however I was very unsure how to choose frames that matched my personality and facial structure. The team made my experience very personalized to me and I’ve purchased over 6 frames over the last year already. Almost every week I’m approached by kind strangers in the street for a compliment. I feel absolutely myself - a more confident version of myself and the quality of the lenses with my prescription are wonderful. They are also my go-to for all the unique pairs of foreign brands including Kuboraum amongst others. A true gem in NYC!

originalText.text: Petite Optique has the most beautiful selection of eyewear. Each pair they have is so unique and stylish.  And they were all so helpful in showing every style and color option they have available. Lyuda was so kind and patient in guiding me towards the perfect pair of sunglasses.  Petite Optique came highly recommended, and it’s no wonder why!

originalText.text: The most amazing and unique frames that are covered by VSP! Great selection of truly unique statement frames that are works of art. They source unique designers from France and Italy and have great options if you love color or want something architectural. Their service is also stellar. I got my prescriptions filled super fast and they were really great at helping me pick out a great set!

text.text: The most amazing and unique frames that are covered by VSP! Great selection of truly unique statement frames that are works of art. They source unique designers from France and Italy and have great options if you love color or want something architectural. Their service is also stellar. I got my prescriptions filled super fast and they were really great at helping me pick out a great set!

originalText.text: Petite Optique is hands down, the best place to go for glasses and sunglasses. I came in a month ago and with the expertise of Lyudmila, found an awesome pair of Theo glasses that fit my face perfectly.  I was so pleased with the quality of lens and the way the glasses turned out, I returned yesterday. Luckily Lyudmila was there along with Ibragim, who also helped me in the past.  We selected a gorgeous pair of Eyevan sunglasses and Anne & Valentine glasses. I can’t wait to pick them up once they are ready. The team there is so patient and fun, and won’t let you walk out of there with anything other than the most perfect fitting glasses.  This is the place to go!
